spec_data.Name: perl-File-HomeDir
spec_data.Description:
File::HomeDir is a module for locating the directories that are "owned"
by a user (typically your user) and to solve the various issues that
arise trying to find them consistently across a wide variety of
platforms.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 11:38:05 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: Find your home and other directories on any platform
